title: Ark Invest cashes in $53M as Coinbase shares reach 12-month high
description:
Ripple’s partial victory in court sent shares of Coinbase soaring to a 12-month high of $114.43 on July 14. Taking advantage of the price bump, Ark Invest funds, led by veteran investor Cathie Wood, partially divested holdings of Coinbase shares. Trades viewed by CryptoSlate indicate that Ark Invest exchange-traded funds (ETFs) sold a total of […]

The post Ark Invest cashes in $53M as Coinbase shares reach 12-month high appeared first on CryptoSlate.
